channel.title: Do you own a computer u got from aarons?
channel.description: [url=http://www.courthousenews.com/2011/05/05/36358.htm]http://www.courthousenews.com/2011/05/05/36358.htm[/url] discuss. just heard about this in class like a minute ago.

item.title: Do you own a computer u got from aarons?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“i code rsps, post:13, topic:393847”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=491032.msg3590783#msg3590783 date=1304621814]

[quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=491032.msg3590781#msg3590781 date=1304621134]

Well thats why people should completely factory default there computers, after buying it.
[/quote]Apparently you didn’t read how they did it. It’s installed in the motherboard, not on the hard drive.
[/quote]Actually I didn’t read it at all. ^^

If you read it then why did you make a false post?[/quote]
Because it logically seems they would put it on the HDD and not motherboard.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you own a computer u got from aarons?
